Line3.5421A: Old superstitions say Khazra bones ward against curses. I’ve never put much stock in old wives’ tales, but if it keeps folk from fleeing, I’ll wear them myself, eh? (laughs) I have no men to go hunting, but I have coin. It's yours if you collect some bones.
VoiceDir1.5421A: Matter of fact. Not very sympathetic to people's fears, but not entirely heartless. Just wants to get the job done.
Line1.5421A: Three workers fled in the night, and by the sound of morale, more are behind them. They say the mine is cursed. Maybe it is, but we’ve a job to finish.
